snapshot.blocks.big-bang.copy.body: Templates are just the starting line. You control the finish.
snapshot.blocks.big-bang.copy.headline: Light mode. Dark mode. Any mode, it's your mode.
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.items.0.body: Many layout systems, not one. Per-breakpoint structure. Independent desktop/mobile padding and spacing. Control columns, stacking, alignment, and reflow—exactly.
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.items.0.title: Layouts, your way
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.items.1.body: Per-corner radius. Borders with custom colors. Shadows outside and inside (linked or independent per-side). Gradient, image, or video backgrounds. Total visual authority.
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.items.1.title: Appearance control without limits
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.items.2.body: Six distinct roles (headline, body, question, answer, button, section). Choose from 17 Google Fonts. Weight, style, size—all customizable per role. Dynamic scales.
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.items.2.title: Typography precision
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.subhead: From layout systems to visual finishes to typography roles, every design decision is controllable in the editor.
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.title: Design freedom, built in.
snapshot.blocks.cta.copy.headline: Start with a template. Make it yours.
snapshot.blocks.cta.copy.subheadline: Pick any template, make it match your brand, and launch your FAQ widget for free.
snapshot.blocks.hero.copy.headline: Start with a style direction, not a blank canvas.
snapshot.blocks.hero.copy.subheadline: Choose a polished FAQ starting point, then tune every detail to match your brand in minutes.
snapshot.blocks.page-meta.copy.description: Start with a pro-designed FAQ template. Customize everything.
snapshot.blocks.page-meta.copy.title: FAQ templates - Clickeen
snapshot.blocks.split-appearance.copy.headline: Interaction design included
snapshot.blocks.split-appearance.copy.subheadline: Hover, active, and focus states are built in so your FAQ feels polished on every device.
snapshot.blocks.split-darkmode.copy.headline: Dark mode is automatic
snapshot.blocks.split-darkmode.copy.subheadline: Your FAQ automatically adapts to light or dark sections so the design always feels native.
snapshot.blocks.split-layouts.copy.headline: Switch layouts instantly
snapshot.blocks.split-layouts.copy.subheadline: Choose Accordion, List, or Cards and switch anytime without rebuilding your content.
snapshot.blocks.split-responsive.copy.headline: Mobile perfection
snapshot.blocks.split-responsive.copy.subheadline: Tap targets, spacing, and layout stay readable across phones, tablets, and desktop screens.
snapshot.blocks.split-trends.copy.headline: One FAQ widget. Infinite looks.
snapshot.blocks.split-trends.copy.subheadline: Move across Liquid Glass, Pure Canvas, Rebel Blocks, and Enterprise Prime without rewriting your answers.
snapshot.blocks.split-typography.copy.headline: Type that feels right
snapshot.blocks.split-typography.copy.subheadline: Use your own fonts or our library, then tune hierarchy for headlines, questions, answers, and CTAs.
snapshot.blocks.steps.copy.items.0.body: Start from the template that matches your brand.
snapshot.blocks.steps.copy.items.0.title: Pick a style
snapshot.blocks.steps.copy.items.1.body: Adjust layout, spacing, colors, radius, and typography in the visual editor.
snapshot.blocks.steps.copy.items.1.title: Customize everything
snapshot.blocks.steps.copy.items.2.body: Push one update and it goes live everywhere your FAQ is embedded.
snapshot.blocks.steps.copy.items.2.title: Publish
snapshot.blocks.steps.copy.subhead: Choose a starting style, fine-tune every detail, and publish one version that updates everywhere.
snapshot.blocks.steps.copy.title: Build your FAQ in three steps
